backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature update replacing the Contact page content and listing related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including pages, layout components, content modules, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style layers defining CSS variables for light/dark themes with a warm color palette.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with all site routes and renders the RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, quick links, disclaimer, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation links, logo, mobile menu, and Get Help Now button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/content/education.ts: Structured educational content definitions for multiple addiction-related sections.
frontend/src/content/resources.ts: Defines a Resource interface, emergency disclaimers, and a list of crisis, treatment, support, and information resource entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module indicating no backend queries are needed for this static site.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles, color variables, light/dark themes, and base typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by rendering React with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, approach, audience details, and a disclaimer section.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Displays India-specific contact details including email, Instagram, and a link to resources.
frontend/src/pages/Faq.tsx: Provides an FAQ list about addiction, recovery, treatment, and related topics using an accordion UI.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero banner, feature cards, and links to key educational and support resources.
frontend/src/pages/HowToSupportSomeone.t: Renders education content on supporting someone with addiction, including alert guidance and sectioned cards.
frontend/src/pages/RecoveryBasics.tsx: Displays recovery basics education content using cards for each subsection.
frontend/src/pages/RelapseNextSteps.tsx: Shows relapse guidance with an alert and detailed recovery steps from the education content.
frontend/src/pages/Resources.tsx: Lists crisis, support, treatment, and information resources with emergency notice and categorized cards.
frontend/src/pages/SignsRiskFactors.tsx: Presents signs and risk factors for addiction using structured sections from education content.
frontend/src/pages/WhatAddictionIs.tsx: Provides an overview of addiction with introduction and detailed educational subsections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the website’s project state, versioning, features, and architectural notes for an informational addiction‑recovery site. Lists required sections, design constraints, and contact‑page guidelines.
